prompt: A close-up, photorealistic image of a pair of hands carefully turning a brittle, yellowed page of an ancient leather-bound book. The book is open, revealing intricate gothic script and illuminated details. Soft, diffused natural light streams in from a window to the left, highlighting the texture of the aged paper and the careful movements of the hands. Focus is razor-sharp on the page and hands, with a shallow depth of field blurring the background into a warm, inviting library setting. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: values-of-old-books-image-1.png

prompt: A wide, photorealistic shot of a dimly lit antique bookstore. Floor-to-ceiling shelves overflow with stacks of old books, their spines faded and worn. A single, warm Edison bulb illuminates a section of the shelves, casting long shadows and creating a sense of mystery and discovery. In the foreground, a magnifying glass rests on an open book, suggesting a search for rare or valuable editions. The composition emphasizes the vastness and history contained within the bookstore. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: values-of-old-books-image-2.png

prompt: A macro, photorealistic image of the gilded edges of a collection of antique books, stacked neatly on top of each other. The gold leaf is slightly worn and tarnished, reflecting soft, ambient light. The focus is extremely sharp, revealing the intricate details and craftsmanship of the gilding. The background is a blurred, dark surface, emphasizing the richness and value of the books' edges. The composition is abstract and artistic, highlighting the beauty of the materials and age. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: values-of-old-books-image-3.png

prompt: A photorealistic image of an appraiser examining an old book with a loupe. The appraiser is a middle-aged person with glasses, wearing a tweed jacket. The book is open on a table covered with a green felt cloth. The background is a bright, professional office setting with bookshelves and historical artifacts. The lighting is even and well-distributed, highlighting the details of the book and the appraiser's focused expression. The composition creates a sense of authority and expertise. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: values-of-old-books-image-4.png

prompt: A photorealistic image depicting a digital interface showing the comparison of prices of a rare first edition book on various online marketplaces (Abebooks, eBay, etc). The screen displays book covers and price listings. The background is a modern, minimalist office space with a laptop and notepad. The lighting is soft and natural, with a slight glare on the screen to enhance realism. The composition visually represents the online research process involved in valuing old books. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: values-of-old-books-image-5.png
